name: @allpurposemachines/mech
description: A user agent for HyperMap services

scripts.build: rm -r dist && npx swc ./src --ignore ./src/assets/*.js -d ./dist && rm ./dist/assets/* && esbuild ./src/assets/shim.js --bundle --outfile=./dist/assets/shim.js && echo '{}' > ./dist/package.json && tsc

author: daniel@allpurposemachines.com
